long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay active and healthy with our Fitness Reminder and Tracker! This innovative Chrome extension encourages regular physical activity during long periods of sitting. It reminds you to take short exercise breaks with customizable alarms. Plus, it offers a simple logging feature to keep track of your fitness activities. Ideal for anyone working at a desk or spending long hours in front of a computer. Enhance your wellness journey with our user-friendly tool, designed to make fitness a seamless part of your daily routine. Get started on a healthier you today!
